Translations.Text: Ultimately DI redeems whomever Li vol. DI est Forgiver Merciful
O vi kred idol worshipers polluted ili ne permes approach Sankt Masjid post this jar! Se vi tim loss rent DI testament dusx vi kun His provisions en accordance kun His vol. DI est Omniscient SAGX

Vi batal dors kontraux those ne kred en DI nor Last Tag nor do ili prohibit ki DI His messenger prohibited nor do ili abide per religi truth! - among those ricev scripture - gxis ili pag due impost volont unwillingly

Jud dir Ezra est fil DI while Christians dir Jesus est fil DI! These blasphemies uttered their busx! Ili tiel alumet blasphemies de those disbelieved en des preter. DI KONDAMN them. Ili surely deviated
Ili set their religious estr scholars lords DI. Others deified Messiah fil Mary. Ili all komand worship nur unu di. tie ne est di escept Li! Li glor alt hav any partners
